mapper.select: select t.MODULE_CODE "id",t.MODULE_NAME "name" from DW_NEWQUERY_MODULE_TYPE t order by to_number(t.ORD)
select t.MODULE_NAME,t.MODULE_CODE from V_DW_NEWQUERY_LOG_URL t where t.URL=#{markName}
select t.KPI_FULL_NAME "KPI_NAME",case t.LABEL_TYPE when 'D' then '1' when 'M' then '2' else '其他' end LABEL_TYPE from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_COMP_KPI_MAPPING t where t.KPI_CODE=#{kpiCode}
select t.SUBJECT_NAME,t.LABEL_TYPE from DW_NEWQUERY_SUBJECT t where t.SUBJECT_CODE=#{subjectCode}
select t.FILENAME from DW_NEWQUERY_REPORT t where t.ID=#{reportCode}

select t.USER_ID,t.K_AUTHORITY,t.T_AUTHORITY,t.R_AUTHORITY from USER_AUTHORITY t where 1 = 1
and t.USER_ID=#{userId}

select upper(k.BM) BM,k.LY,k.CON,k.RN,k.MARKNAME,j.KPI_FULL_NAME KS_NAME,case j.LABEL_TYPE when 'D' then '1' when 'M' then '2' else '其他' end LABEL_TYPE from ( select * from (SELECT T.*, rank() over(partition by BM order by LY desc, CON desc, VALAUS desc) RN from (select MARKCODE BM, 1 LY, VALAUS, 0 CON, MARKNAME from DM.MANU_BOOSTING_CODE where MARKNAME in ('indexdetails') UNION ALL select SPECIFICMARK BM,0 LY,0 VALAUS,count(SPECIFICMARK) CON,MARKNAME from DM.DW30_ES_BASE_2 where MARKNAME in ('indexdetails') group by SPECIFICMARK, MARKNAME) T order by LY desc, VALAUS desc, CON desc) WHERE RN = 1 )k left join DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_COMP_KPI_MAPPING j on upper(k.BM)=j.KPI_CODE

select upper(k.BM) BM,k.LY,k.CON,k.RN,k.MARKNAME,j.SUBJECT_NAME KS_NAME, j.LABEL_TYPE from (select * from (select T.*, rank() over(partition by BM order by LY desc, CON desc, VALAUS desc) RN from (select MARKCODE BM, 1 LY, VALAUS, 0 CON,MARKNAME from DM.MANU_BOOSTING_CODE where MARKNAME in ('specialreport','thememonthcheck') UNION ALL select SPECIFICMARK BM,0 LY,0 VALAUS,count(SPECIFICMARK) CON,MARKNAME from DM.DW30_ES_BASE_2 where MARKNAME in ('specialreport','thememonthcheck') group by SPECIFICMARK, MARKNAME) T order by LY desc, VALAUS desc, CON desc) WHERE RN = 1) k left join DW_NEWQUERY_SUBJECT j on upper(k.BM)=j.SUBJECT_CODE
